oracle.dbtools.apex

Class OWA

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.dbtools.apex.OWA

  • public class OWA
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the functionality for invoking the Oracle Web Access PL/SQL Gateway. Sets up the OWA environment and then invokes the PL/SQL procedure and returns the result to the client. Retrieving OWA line buffer, LOB and BFILE are all supported.
